Mafia Island.title: Mafia Island
Mafia Island.byline: Mafia Island off the coast of Tanzania must be one of the Indian Ocean's best hidden gems.

Mafra.title: Mafra
Mafra.byline: Mafra is a city of 77,000 people (2011) in Greater Lisbon, Estremadura, Portugal.

Maffra.title: Maffra
Maffra.byline: Maffra is a small agricultural town in Gippsland, Victoria with a rich local history and heritage.
